name: Gov. Greg Abbott
tweet: In Texas, we #BackTheBlue.   To answer the call of duty, to willingly stand between the people you serve and the dangers that threaten—that is a high calling only the best can answer. tweet: Opportunity is what Texas is all about! name: Gov. Greg Abbott
tweet: “Texans have never backed down from a challenge, & we won't start now, because our efforts are stemming the tide of illegal drugs & criminals flooding into Texas." – Gov. Abbott  Learn more about Operation Lone Star ⬇️  https://t.co/gc27nMyOEC

name: Gov. Greg Abbott
tweet: Since the launch of #OperationLoneStar, multi-agency efforts have led to 208,000+ migrant apprehensions & 11,800 charges for criminal offenses—including 9,300+ felony charges.  And in the fight against fentanyl, DPS has seized over 269 million lethal doses throughout the state.

name: Gov. Greg Abbott
